Question: Livall Tech. Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LIVALL Tech. Co., Ltd.

Smart Motorcycle Helmet MC1 Range

- Features cutting-edge technology and user-centric design
- Propels LIVALL into high-speed cycling domain
- Integrates Bluetooth speakers, smart lighting, fall detection, and SOS alert
- Showcased at CES 2024, emphasizing safety and innovation
- LIVALL PikaBoost enhances riding enjoyment with swift installation and safety features
- Strategic entry into the connected world of two-wheel travel
- Founder and CEO Bryan ZHENG envisions intelligent and safe cycling experiences
- Design philosophy addresses user pain points, emphasizing safety and enjoyment
- Integration of sustainable development principles reflects commitment to environmental responsibility
Summary_cn:
LIVALL 科技有限公司。

智能摩托车头盔 MC1 系列

- 结合了尖端技术和用户至上的设计
- 将 LIVALL 推向高速骑行领域
- 集成了蓝牙扬声器、智能照明、跌倒检测和 SOS 警报
- 在 CES 2024 上展示，强调安全和创新
- LIVALL PikaBoost 通过快速安装和安全功能提高骑行乐趣
- 进入了双轮出行的连接世界
- 创始人兼首席执行官 Bryan ZHENG 愿景是智能和安全的骑行体验
- 设计理念针对用户的痛点，强调安全和享受
- 可持续发展原则的整合反映了对环境责任的承诺
